featured.text: Doctors have repeatedly warned people of the serious effect of noise on their hearing.
Which of the following is NOT mentioned as a feature that would trigger earworms? (A) Tunes repeatedly encountered.
He frequently ordered blood tests and X-rays, and repeatedly referred her to specialists for even minor complaints.
RTRI officials explain that deer have a habit of repeatedly snorting short, shrill sounds to alert other deer when they perceive danger.

definition.en_def: In a manner that occurs again and again.
definition.example: She practiced the song repeatedly until she got it right.
